effects: Physical damage (1.8x) as HP drain (30%) to one enemy
Reduce SPR by 45% for 3 turns to one enemy
Inflict 2 random status effects (Confusion 30%, Sleep 25%, Blind 20% and Poison 15%) to one enemy
name: Sweet Poison

desc_short: Drain HP, reduce SPR and randomly poison, blind, put to sleep, or confuse one enemy
吸收1名敵人的HP+降低精神的數值+隨機施加毒失明睡眠混亂效果
적 1명의 HP 흡수+정신력 감소+무작위로 독, 암흑, 수면, 혼란 부여
Absorbe les PV, réduit la PSY et inflige poison, cécité, sommeil ou confusion au hasard à un ennemi
Stiehlt einem Gegner LP, veringert seine PSY + zuf. Gift, Blind, Schlaf oder Konfus.
